resources.string: Our App provides a list of Pokémon data which includes information about the first 5 generations of Pokémon."

The Home Page features a list of Pokémon, each of which users can select to view detailed information, including the Pokémons ID, Name, Types, Description, Height, Weight, Abilities, Stats, and Evolutions.
Users can register an account and log in to the app, enabling them to access their saved Pokémon and preferences across devices.
Our app allows users to search for a specific Pokémon and save their favorites to Firestore, so they can view them on their My Pokémon page.
